subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology
Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* The "mist" sense is never used in a [[meteorology|meteorological]] sense, where it is referred to as {{m|ja|靄|tr=moya}}.
* Around the {{w|Heian period}}, [[spring]] mists were referred to as ''kasumi'' while in [[autumn]] they were called {{m|ja|霧|tr=kiri|lit=[[fog]]}}; there was no distinction in both seasons in literature before that era as they were used interchangeably.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|霞に千%鳥|かすみ に ち%どり}}
* {{ja-r|霞を食う|かすみ を く.う}}

subSections.title: Proper noun
